camera-operator.name: Camera Operator Workshop
camera-operator.description: Learn Camera Operator skills, tips, and blocking techniques for operating the camera. Hand Held/Dolly/Sliders/Jib Arm and Wheel Remote Heads will be covered.
features: Hand held, dolly, sliders, and jib arm operating
Remote head camera control
Professional framing and blocking techniques
Real production scenarios and set experience
Work with professional ARRI & RED cameras

steadicam.name: Steadicam Operator Workshop
steadicam.description: Learn to operate, build and balance a Steadicam. Learn specialized skills, tips and more from an experienced professional, as well as valuable hands-on experience.
features: Operate, build, and balance professional Steadicam rigs
Learn specialized skills and tips from experienced professionals
Advanced movement and stabilization techniques
Industry insider tips for professional work
Valuable hands-on experience with pro equipment

gimbal.name: Gimbal Operator Workshop
gimbal.description: Professional and prosumer gimbals everything from the new Ronin RS3 to the professional Movi Pro. GIMBALS will be mounted on Steadicam arms and Jib Arms.
features: Professional and prosumer gimbals from Ronin RS3 to Movi Pro
Gimbals mounted on Steadicam arms and Jib Arms
Master smooth, dynamic shots and advanced techniques
Latest gimbal technology and real-world applications
Work with industry-standard equipment

1st-ac.name: 1st Camera Assistant Workshop
1st-ac.description: Learn to become a 1st Camera Assistant (focus pulling skills). Learn about lenses and the workings of the camera department on Saturday with additional assisting with Steadicam on Sunday.
features: Focus pulling mastery and professional techniques
Comprehensive lens knowledge and characteristics
Camera department workflow and protocols
Saturday camera operating + Sunday Steadicam assisting
Essential skills for professional AC work

2nd-ac.name: 2nd Camera Assistant Workshop
2nd-ac.description: Learn to become a 2nd Camera Assistant (clapper loader). Learn about lenses and the workings of the camera department on Saturday with an additional day assisting with the Steadicam.
features: Clapper loader skills and techniques
Camera prep, maintenance, and troubleshooting
Professional set protocols and procedures
Additional day assisting with Steadicam operations
Industry standards and camera department workflow

car-mounts.name: Car Mounts and Rigs Workshop
car-mounts.description: Poor Man's Process techniques for vehicle shots. Learn professional car mounting and rigging.
features: Poor Man's Process techniques for vehicle shots
Professional car mounting systems and rigging
Camera placement and angle techniques
Safety protocols for vehicle camera work
Industry-standard rigging equipment

phone-cameras.name: Phone Cameras Workshop
phone-cameras.description: Professional lighting techniques for phone cameras. Master mobile filmmaking for podcasts and short films.
features: Professional lighting techniques for phone cameras
Camera operating and movement for mobile filmmaking
Essential techniques for podcasts and short films
Pro mobile filmmaking workflow and best practices
Maximize your phone's camera capabilities

steadicam-gimbal-combo.name: Steadicam + Gimbal Combo
steadicam-gimbal-combo.description: Save $180 by registering for both Sunday workshops

full-weekend.name: Camera Op + Steadicam + Gimbal
full-weekend.description: Save $145 by registering for the full weekend

settings.freeBonus: FREE Music Video Workshop included ($150 value)
